fatal stealth.name: Fatal Stealth
fatal stealth.desc:
You deal increased backstab damage to opponents based on how high your stealth stat currently is.
[*Note: +0.2% damage per 1 Stealth from Equipment.]

stature break.name: Stature Break
stature break.desc: Landing a backstab of any kind disables posture for 8 seconds.

flanking maneuvers.name: Flanking Maneuvers
flanking maneuvers.desc: Enemies you assassinate take more PEN from your squadmates in your party.

tacet minimization.name: Tacet Minimization
tacet minimization.desc: Focus your Tacet even further, allowing the radius at which you get spotted to become smaller temporarily.

backstabber.name: Backstabber
backstabber.desc: Landing a backhit with a light attack causes you to grab your opponent and stab them again, dealing an extra 15 damage.

executioner's frenzy.name: Executioner's Frenzy
executioner's frenzy.desc: Landing a light attack while an opponent's posture is paused reduces their assassination cooldown by 5 seconds.
